name: Run Prisioner Run
description:
Similar to Runner games, "Run Prisoner Run" is a very simple game. Ideal for when the internet does not work or when you have to wait long times, even when you have a lot of stress.  The game consists of a prisoner running trying to escape from the jail, while the police appear in front of him. The player will use the up and down arrow keys to control the prisoner. The objective is to avoid the police and catch objects that will appear randomly to score points: 

Money = 1 point

Key = 5 points 

But if you touch a policeman or a macana you will lose 10 points. The game ends until you run out of points. 

To restart just press the R key. 

To exit press Alt and F4 (Windows)
